channel.title: visa free! on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa
channel.description: Recent content in visa free! on The 5 Day Shenzhen Visa

item.title: Not everybody needs a visaâ€¦.
item.description: Not everybody needs a visa to enter China. There are a few nationalities that do not need a visa at all: 90 days visa free entry: San Marino 60 days: Mauritius 30 days: Bahamas, Barbados, Ecuador, Fiji, Grenada, Serbia, Seychelles, Tonga, UAE (after 16th January 2018) 15 days: Brunei, Japan, Singapore
